actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 96-685.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H.R. 2977, a bill to provide for Federal support and stimulation of State, local, and community activities to prevent domestic violence and assist victims of domestic violence, for coordination of Federal programs and activities pertaining to domestic violence, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 2977 (Domestic violence prevention program).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H.R. 2977, a bill to provide for Federal support and stimulation of State, local, and community activities to prevent domestic violence and assist victims of domestic violence, for coordination of Federal programs and activities pertaining to domestic violence, and for other purposes.
